item.title: Citigroup swings to fourth-quarter profit, tops estimates on investment banking strength
item.description: The fourth-quarter report comes after a year where Citi's stock rose almost 37%, outperforming the S&P 500.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase posts record profit as the bank’s massive scale pays off
item.description: The bank said profit rose 50% to $14 billion in the fourth quarter as noninterest expenses fell 7% from a year earlier.

item.title: Goldman Sachs shares rise after topping estimates on strong trading results
item.description: Goldman's fourth-quarter results will give investors a preview of what to expect this year, as investment banking and trading fees are both expected t...

item.title: 9 questions we want answered when our 3 financial names report earnings Wednesday
item.description: Wells Fargo, Goldman Sachs and BlackRock will all post Q4 results before the bell.

item.title: Retailers post early holiday results — and Wall Street isn’t impressed
item.description: Lululemon, Abercrombie & Fitch and American Eagle all hiked their holiday guidance, but Abercrombie's growth is slowing.
